Articles.Content: I've been on the KSP train since somewhere around .22 or .23, and I decided it was about time I joined the forums!

Hello Spaceman510, and welcome to the forum!

It's definitely about time you joined. Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

[quote name='Starhawk']Hello Spaceman510, and welcome to the forum!

It's definitely about time you joined. Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings![/QUOTE]
Happy to be here! :)

Welcome to the forums!

Hello! I'm an adventurous lurker as well.

Hello xdbv, and welcome to the forum!

You no longer need to be a lurker. The adventure begins!

Happy landings!
